Split data by given variables into list

Source: R/utils.R
split_data_by_var.Rd

Split data by given variables into list

Usage

split_data_by_var(datain, split_by = "", split_by_prefix = "")

Arguments

datain

Input data

split_by

Variables to split data by (used if split_by_prefix is "")

split_by_prefix

Prefix to identify splitting variables

Value

list of dataframe(s)

Examples

split_data_by_var(iris, "Species")
#> <list_of<
#>   tbl_df<
#>     Sepal.Length: double
#>     Sepal.Width : double
#>     Petal.Length: double
#>     Petal.Width : double
#>     Species     : factor<fb977>
#>   >
#> >[3]>
